newsitem.title: USA: Medtronic Q2 paced by pacemaker sales.
newsitem.headline: Medtronic Q2 paced by pacemaker sales.

text.p: Medtronic Inc, reporting a 24.8-percent increase in second-quarter earnings on a 15 percent rise in revenues, said sales of its Bradycardia-brand pacemakers and leads posted double-digit gains for the tenth straight quarter.
Revenues for Medtronic's Micro Jewel implantable defibrillator rose 20 percent.
The medical devices manufacturer added that it began shipping the Micro Jewel II defibrillator this month after winning approval from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration.
Earnings in the quarter increased to $128.3 million, or $0.54 per share, while revenues climbed to $598.2 million.
